attributes.action: COVID-19. Super markets limit shopping to one basket per visit, no trolleys.
attributes.additional_details: The panic buying which some selfish people are presently doing is making a already challenging situation for all, very distressing and uncessesarily difficult for everyone else.
attributes.background: Impose shopping restrictions to make the food availability fairer to all, limiting shopping trips to one basket per visit to minimise panic buying.  Prohibit the use of any trolleys except by the old and infirm.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300766
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302823
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
